attributes.action: acknowledge that Cancer is a disease of our times - Why is the governement failing to step up to this challenge?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Explain why Renal Cell Carcinoma patients are being failed by their own Primary Care Trusts and the Government, to ensure that the most effective drug treatment, which is licensed is made available on the NHS to all and not the Postcode Lottery that exists in this Country?
